title: BRIEF-Ultragenyx And Kyowa Kirin Announce Crysvita® (Burosumab-Twza) Now Launched In The U.S.
text:
April 30, 2018 / 12:55 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Ultragenyx And Kyowa Kirin Announce Crysvita® (Burosumab-Twza) Now Launched In The U.S. Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Ultragenyx Pharmaceutical Inc:
* ULTRAGENYX AND KYOWA KIRIN ANNOUNCE CRYSVITA® (BUROSUMAB-TWZA) NOW LAUNCHED IN THE U.S. FOR THE TREATMENT OF X–LINKED HYPOPHOSPHATEMIA (XLH) IN CHILDREN AND ADULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
